trans-unit.source: These guides will first walk you through creating a Windows Server Container environment in Azure or Hyper-V.
trans-unit.target: These guides will first walk you through creating a Windows Server Container environment in Azure or Hyper-V.

trans-unit.source: Next you can work through a quick start for creating and managing Window Server Containers using either PowerShell or Docker.
